product_name: Sea to Summit 1-Pin Side-Release Field Repair Buckle
long_description: The Sea to Summit 1-Pin Side-Release Field Repair Buckle replaces a single-side adjustable buckle like the type found on top-loading backpacks. Stainless steel pins hold the buckle together permanently; a Phillips head screwdriver securely attaches the buckle to the webbing on your pack's strap. Since the buckle is permanent, there's no need to have your new buckle sewn on when you're back home. Sea to Summit 2-Pin Side-Release Field Repair Buckle is available in 2 widths: 3/4 in. and 1 in.
short_description: The Sea to Summit 1-Pin Side-Release Field Repair Buckle replaces a single-side adjustable buckle like the type found on top-loading backpacks.
